body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Sweet Treats Bakery's customer support. My name is Bryan Martinez. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Bryan, my name is Catherine Russell. I'm hoping you can help me with a data management issue I'm having.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hi Catherine, I'd be happy to help you with that. Can you provide me with the details of the issue you're facing?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure. I'm having trouble accessing the sales data for the past three months. The system is not displaying the records.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I see. I'll need to verify some personal information to assist you further. Can I have your customer ID number, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, my customer ID is one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Catherine. May I also have the email address associated with your account?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Alright, I've found your account. I will look into the issue with your sales data. Please hold on for a moment.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for waiting, Catherine. I've identified the problem, and it should be resolved now. You should be able to access the sales data correctly.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Oh, that's such a relief! Thank you so much, Bryan.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Catherine. Thank you for your patience. If you need any further assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
